name: Zombie in my city
description: Step in the midst of a low poly zombie apocalypse. Kill them all and save the town where you growing up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590/AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
